skill.name: deep-research
skill.description: Conduct enterprise-grade research with multi-source synthesis, citation tracking, and verification. Use when user needs comprehensive analysis requiring 10+ sources, verified claims, or comparison of approaches. Triggers include "deep research", "comprehensive analysis", "research report", "compare X vs Y", or "analyze trends". Do NOT use for simple lookups, debugging, or questions answerable with 1-2 searches.
skill.summary: Conduct enterprise-grade research with multi-source synthesis, citation tracking, and verification. ...
skill.author: 199-biotechnologies

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate research skill with minimal risk. All Python scripts use standard library only. Network access is limited to DOI/URL verification for citation validation - a core feature. File system access is restricted to user-specific directories. No code execution, credential access, or data exfiltration patterns detected.

content.value_statement: Need thorough, citation-backed research across multiple sources? This skill delivers verified, professional-grade reports through an 8-phase methodology with source credibility scoring and automatic citation validation. Stop spending hours searching and synthesizing‚Äîget comprehensive analysis ready for decisions.
actual_capabilities: Executes 8-phase research pipeline (Scope ‚Üí Plan ‚Üí Retrieve ‚Üí Triangulate ‚Üí Synthesize ‚Üí Critique ‚Üí Refine ‚Üí Package)
Parallel search execution across 5-10 concurrent searches for faster results
Source credibility scoring (0-100) for academic, government, and technical domains
Citation verification via DOI resolver and URL accessibility checks
Generates markdown, HTML (McKinsey-style), and PDF report formats
Auto-continuation system for unlimited-length reports via recursive agent spawning
limitations: Requires internet connection for web searches and citation verification
Does not access private databases, paywalled content, or authenticated APIs
Report quality depends on publicly available web sources
Cannot verify citations in real-time during generation (post-generation validation only)

use_cases.title: Technology evaluation
use_cases.description: Compare frameworks, tools, or platforms with verified sources and structured analysis

use_cases.title: Market research
use_cases.description: Analyze industry trends, funding patterns, or competitive landscapes

use_cases.title: Academic investigation
use_cases.description: Synthesize scientific literature with citation tracking and credibility assessment

prompt_templates.title: Quick overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Use deep research in quick mode to explore [topic] and identify key sources

prompt_templates.title: Standard analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Use deep research to analyze [specific question] with 15+ verified sources

prompt_templates.title: Deep investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use deep research in deep mode to compare [A vs B] with full triangulation and critique

prompt_templates.title: UltraDeep report
prompt_templates.prompt: Use deep research in ultradeep mode to generate a comprehensive report on [topic] covering all major aspects

output_examples.input: Use deep research to analyze quantum computing state of the art in 2025
output: Executive Summary with 3-5 key findings (under 250 words)
Research scope, methodology, and assumptions documented
4-8 detailed findings with 3+ source citations each
Synthesis of patterns and novel insights
Limitations, counterevidence, and areas of uncertainty
Complete bibliography with all 15-30 sources verified

best_practices: Specify your research mode (quick/standard/deep/ultradeep) based on time available and depth needed
Frame questions clearly with context‚Äîspecific questions yield better results
Review Phase 1 (Scope) output to ensure research is aligned with your needs
Use citation numbers in reports to trace claims back to source material
anti_patterns: Using this skill for simple lookups that WebSearch can answer in one query
Asking for debugging help‚Äîthis skill focuses on research, not code fixes
Expecting real-time updates on breaking news‚Äîresearch relies on indexed sources
Using for time-sensitive queries without specifying urgency in the research scope

faq.question: What modes are available and when should I use each?
faq.answer: Quick (2-5 min) for exploration, Standard (5-10 min) for most questions, Deep (10-20 min) for important decisions, UltraDeep (20-45 min) for comprehensive reports.

faq.question: How many sources does a typical report include?
faq.answer: Quick mode: 10+ sources, Standard: 15-30, Deep: 25-40, UltraDeep: 30-50+. All sources are scored for credibility.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with other Claude tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Use WebSearch and WebFetch first, then invoke deep research for synthesis. The skill integrates with Claude Code workflow.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using citation verification?
faq.answer: Citation verification only checks DOI/URL accessibility‚Äîit does not send your research data externally. Only minimal metadata is exchanged.

faq.question: Why did my report fail validation?
faq.answer: Common issues: missing bibliography entries, placeholders like TODO, broken internal links, or citations without matching sources. Fix and regenerate.

faq.question: How does this compare to Claude Desktop research?
faq.answer: This skill adds 8-phase methodology, source credibility scoring, citation validation, multiple output formats, and unlimited-length reports via auto-continuation.
